data.title: Brooks School Elementary
data.text:
MAP TO FIND YOUR SCHOOL

Use the Google Map Tool above to locate which school aligns with your home address. To navigate the map effectively, you might need to "zoom out" as the initial search result zooms into your precise location. This way, you can view the entire map and determine the school more easily. Please note, if you're relocating to a new area, the information may not instantly appear on Google Maps. In such instances, we recommend giving us a call at (317) 594-4100 to verify the school your student will attend.

If you are a new enrollee, assigned to Southeastern Elementary School and/or Hamilton Southeastern Int./Jr. High School, please review the Enrollment Changes for SY 2024-25 located below in Additional Resources & Information.

NEW families will need to create a Skyward Account :

Complete the New Student Account Request Form to create a temporary Skyward account. You will then receive an email containing login information and a link to the Skyward application portal for parents/guardians. If you don't have an email, simply click on "I do not have an email." Enter the given login credentials to complete the setup process. If you experience any difficulties with the enrollment process, please contact your student's assigned school.

Request Skyward Family Access

Already have a Skyward Family Access login?

Families wishing to add a sibling, complete the following:

Log into your Family Access account on Skyward.

Navigate to the upper left-hand corner and select 'New Student Online Enrollment.'

**Existing families transitioning from grade-to-grade do not have re-enroll; simply update your student's Back to School Forms in Skyward.

Once logged into your Skyward Family Access account, there are six (6) steps to the application with instructions for each area. As you complete each item, be sure to save before moving on in the process.

In 'Step 5,' you will upload your required documents.. If unable to upload the required documents electronically, you will still select Complete Step 5 and move to Step 6 button.

Once completed, click Submit Application. If there is more than one student to enroll, click Enroll Additional Students to start a new application.

In-person enrollment assistance will take place three separate occasions over the summer for K-8 students. High school students who need help can visit their building. The Hamilton Southeastern Schools administration office is located at 13485 Cumberland Road, Fishers, IN 46038.

Before you visit, please gather the following information and documents:

State-issued birth certificate

Photo ID

Proof of guardianship or custody

Proof of residency

Current immunization records

Enrollment specialists will be available from 2-7 p.m. on the following days:

Thursday, June 27th

Thursday, July 11th

Thursday, July 18th
